00014 inline b3Float4 b3Lerp3(const b3Float4& a,const b3Float4& b, float  t)
00015 {
00016         return b3MakeVector3(   a.x + (b.x - a.x) * t,
00017                                                 a.y + (b.y - a.y) * t,
00018                                                 a.z + (b.z - a.z) * t,
00019                                                 0.f);
00020 }

00022 
00023 // Clips a face to the back of a plane, return the number of vertices out, stored in ppVtxOut
00024 inline int b3ClipFace(const b3Float4* pVtxIn, int numVertsIn, b3Float4& planeNormalWS,float planeEqWS, b3Float4* ppVtxOut)
00025 {
00026         
00027         int ve;
00028         float ds, de;
00029         int numVertsOut = 0;
00030         if (numVertsIn < 2)
00031                 return 0;
00032 
00033         b3Float4 firstVertex=pVtxIn[numVertsIn-1];
00034         b3Float4 endVertex = pVtxIn[0];
00035         
00036         ds = b3Dot3F4(planeNormalWS,firstVertex)+planeEqWS;
00037 
00038         for (ve = 0; ve < numVertsIn; ve++)
00039         {
00040                 endVertex=pVtxIn[ve];
00041 
00042                 de = b3Dot3F4(planeNormalWS,endVertex)+planeEqWS;
00043 
00044                 if (ds<0)
00045                 {
00046                         if (de<0)
00047                         {
00048                                 // Start < 0, end < 0, so output endVertex
00049                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = endVertex;
00050                         }
00051                         else
00052                         {
00053                                 // Start < 0, end >= 0, so output intersection
00054                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = b3Lerp3(firstVertex, endVertex,(ds * 1.f/(ds - de)) );
00055                         }
00056                 }
00057                 else
00058                 {
00059                         if (de<0)
00060                         {
00061                                 // Start >= 0, end < 0 so output intersection and end
00062                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = b3Lerp3(firstVertex, endVertex,(ds * 1.f/(ds - de)) );
00063                                 ppVtxOut[numVertsOut++] = endVertex;
00064                         }
00065                 }
00066                 firstVertex = endVertex;
00067                 ds = de;
00068         }
00069         return numVertsOut;
00070 }

00072 
00073 inline int b3ClipFaceAgainstHull(const b3Float4& separatingNormal, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA,  
00074         const b3Float4& posA, const b3Quaternion& ornA, b3Float4* worldVertsB1, int numWorldVertsB1,
00075         b3Float4* worldVertsB2, int capacityWorldVertsB2,
00076         const float minDist, float maxDist,
00077         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& verticesA,        const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00078         //const b3Float4* verticesB,    const b3GpuFace* facesB,        const int* indicesB,
00079         b3Float4* contactsOut,
00080         int contactCapacity)
00081 {
00082         int numContactsOut = 0;
00083 
00084         b3Float4* pVtxIn = worldVertsB1;
00085         b3Float4* pVtxOut = worldVertsB2;
00086         
00087         int numVertsIn = numWorldVertsB1;
00088         int numVertsOut = 0;
00089 
00090         int closestFaceA=-1;
00091         {
00092                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
00093                 for(int face=0;face<hullA->m_numFaces;face++)
00094                 {
00095                         const b3Float4 Normal = b3MakeVector3(
00096                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x, 
00097                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y, 
00098                                 facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,0.f);
00099                         const b3Float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,Normal);
00100                 
00101                         float d = b3Dot3F4(faceANormalWS,separatingNormal);
00102                         if (d < dmin)
00103                         {
00104                                 dmin = d;
00105                                 closestFaceA = face;
00106                         }
00107                 }
00108         }
00109         if (closestFaceA<0)
00110                 return numContactsOut;
00111 
00112         b3GpuFace polyA = facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+closestFaceA];
00113 
00114         // clip polygon to back of planes of all faces of hull A that are adjacent to witness face
00115         //int numContacts = numWorldVertsB1;
00116         int numVerticesA = polyA.m_numIndices;
00117         for(int e0=0;e0<numVerticesA;e0++)
00118         {
00119                 const b3Float4 a = verticesA[hullA->m_vertexOffset+indicesA[polyA.m_indexOffset+e0]];
00120                 const b3Float4 b = verticesA[hullA->m_vertexOffset+indicesA[polyA.m_indexOffset+((e0+1)%numVerticesA)]];
00121                 const b3Float4 edge0 = a - b;
00122                 const b3Float4 WorldEdge0 = b3QuatRotate(ornA,edge0);
00123                 b3Float4 planeNormalA = b3MakeFloat4(polyA.m_plane.x,polyA.m_plane.y,polyA.m_plane.z,0.f);
00124                 b3Float4 worldPlaneAnormal1 = b3QuatRotate(ornA,planeNormalA);
00125 
00126                 b3Float4 planeNormalWS1 = -b3Cross3(WorldEdge0,worldPlaneAnormal1);
00127                 b3Float4 worldA1 = b3TransformPoint(a,posA,ornA);
00128                 float planeEqWS1 = -b3Dot3F4(worldA1,planeNormalWS1);
00129                 
00130                 b3Float4 planeNormalWS = planeNormalWS1;
00131                 float planeEqWS=planeEqWS1;
00132                 
00133                 //clip face
00134                 //clipFace(*pVtxIn, *pVtxOut,planeNormalWS,planeEqWS);
00135                 numVertsOut = b3ClipFace(pVtxIn, numVertsIn, planeNormalWS,planeEqWS, pVtxOut);
00136 
00137                 //btSwap(pVtxIn,pVtxOut);
00138                 b3Float4* tmp = pVtxOut;
00139                 pVtxOut = pVtxIn;
00140                 pVtxIn = tmp;
00141                 numVertsIn = numVertsOut;
00142                 numVertsOut = 0;
00143         }
00144 
00145         
00146         // only keep points that are behind the witness face
00147         {
00148                 b3Float4 localPlaneNormal  = b3MakeFloat4(polyA.m_plane.x,polyA.m_plane.y,polyA.m_plane.z,0.f);
00149                 float localPlaneEq = polyA.m_plane.w;
00150                 b3Float4 planeNormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,localPlaneNormal);
00151                 float planeEqWS=localPlaneEq-b3Dot3F4(planeNormalWS,posA);
00152                 for (int i=0;i<numVertsIn;i++)
00153                 {
00154                         float depth = b3Dot3F4(planeNormalWS,pVtxIn[i])+planeEqWS;
00155                         if (depth <=minDist)
00156                         {
00157                                 depth = minDist;
00158                         }
00159                         if (numContactsOut<contactCapacity)
00160                         {
00161                                 if (depth <=maxDist)
00162                                 {
00163                                         b3Float4 pointInWorld = pVtxIn[i];
00164                                         //resultOut.addContactPoint(separatingNormal,point,depth);
00165                                         contactsOut[numContactsOut++] = b3MakeVector3(pointInWorld.x,pointInWorld.y,pointInWorld.z,depth);
00166                                         //printf("depth=%f\n",depth);
00167                                 }
00168                         } else
00169                         {
00170                                 b3Error("exceeding contact capacity (%d,%df)\n", numContactsOut,contactCapacity);
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00175         return numContactsOut;
00176 }

00179 
00180 inline int      b3ClipHullAgainstHull(const b3Float4& separatingNormal, 
00181         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
00182         const b3Float4& posA, const b3Quaternion& ornA,const b3Float4& posB, const b3Quaternion& ornB, 
00183         b3Float4* worldVertsB1, b3Float4* worldVertsB2, int capacityWorldVerts,
00184         const float minDist, float maxDist,
00185         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& verticesA,        const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00186         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& verticesB,        const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,  const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
00187 
00188         b3Float4*       contactsOut,
00189         int contactCapacity)
00190 {
00191         int numContactsOut = 0;
00192         int numWorldVertsB1= 0;
00193         
00194         B3_PROFILE("clipHullAgainstHull");
00195 
00196         //float curMaxDist=maxDist;
00197         int closestFaceB=-1;
00198         float dmax = -FLT_MAX;
00199 
00200         {
00201                 //B3_PROFILE("closestFaceB");
00202                 if (hullB.m_numFaces!=1)
00203                 {
00204                         //printf("wtf\n");
00205                 }
00206                 static bool once = true;
00207                 //printf("separatingNormal=%f,%f,%f\n",separatingNormal.x,separatingNormal.y,separatingNormal.z);
00208                 
00209                 for(int face=0;face<hullB.m_numFaces;face++)
00210                 {
00211 #ifdef BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
00212                         if (once)
00213                                 printf("face %d\n",face);
00214                         const b3GpuFace* faceB = &facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face];
00215                         if (once)
00216                         {
00217                                 for (int i=0;i<faceB->m_numIndices;i++)
00218                                 {
00219                                         b3Float4 vert = verticesB[hullB.m_vertexOffset+indicesB[faceB->m_indexOffset+i]];
00220                                         printf("vert[%d] = %f,%f,%f\n",i,vert.x,vert.y,vert.z);
00221                                 }
00222                         }
00223 #endif //BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
00224                         //if (facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_numIndices>2)
00225                         {
00226                                 const b3Float4 Normal = b3MakeVector3(facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x, 
00227                                         facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y, facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,0.f);
00228                                 const b3Float4 WorldNormal = b3QuatRotate(ornB, Normal);
00229 #ifdef BT_DEBUG_SAT_FACE
00230                                 if (once)
00231                                         printf("faceNormal = %f,%f,%f\n",Normal.x,Normal.y,Normal.z);
00232 #endif
00233                                 float d = b3Dot3F4(WorldNormal,separatingNormal);
00234                                 if (d > dmax)
00235                                 {
00236                                         dmax = d;
00237                                         closestFaceB = face;
00238                                 }
00239                         }
00240                 }
00241                 once = false;
00242         }
00243 
00244         
00245         b3Assert(closestFaceB>=0);
00246         {
00247                 //B3_PROFILE("worldVertsB1");
00248                 const b3GpuFace& polyB = facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+closestFaceB];
00249                 const int numVertices = polyB.m_numIndices;
00250                 for(int e0=0;e0<numVertices;e0++)
00251                 {
00252                         const b3Float4& b = verticesB[hullB.m_vertexOffset+indicesB[polyB.m_indexOffset+e0]];
00253                         worldVertsB1[numWorldVertsB1++] = b3TransformPoint(b,posB,ornB);
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 
00257         if (closestFaceB>=0)
00258         {
00259                 //B3_PROFILE("clipFaceAgainstHull");
00260                 numContactsOut = b3ClipFaceAgainstHull((b3Float4&)separatingNormal, &hullA, 
00261                                 posA,ornA,
00262                                 worldVertsB1,numWorldVertsB1,worldVertsB2,capacityWorldVerts, minDist, maxDist,
00263                                 verticesA,                              facesA,                         indicesA,
00264                                 contactsOut,contactCapacity);
00265         }
00266 
00267         return numContactsOut;
00268 }

00273 inline int b3ClipHullHullSingle(
00274                         int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,
00275                                                                                  const b3Float4& posA,
00276                                                                                  const b3Quaternion& ornA,
00277                                                                                  const b3Float4& posB,
00278                                                                                  const b3Quaternion& ornB,
00279 
00280                         int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB,
00281 
00282                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>* bodyBuf, 
00283                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4Data>* globalContactOut, 
00284                         int& nContacts,
00285                         
00286                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& hostConvexDataA,
00287                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& hostConvexDataB,
00288         
00289                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA, 
00290                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesA, 
00291                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,
00292                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00293         
00294                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,
00295                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesB,
00296                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,
00297                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
00298 
00299                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& hostCollidablesA,
00300                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& hostCollidablesB,
00301                         const b3Vector3& sepNormalWorldSpace,
00302                         int maxContactCapacity                  )
00303 {
00304         int contactIndex = -1;
00305         b3ConvexPolyhedronData hullA, hullB;
00306     
00307     b3Collidable colA = hostCollidablesA[collidableIndexA];
00308     hullA = hostConvexDataA[colA.m_shapeIndex];
00309     //printf("numvertsA = %d\n",hullA.m_numVertices);
00310     
00311     
00312     b3Collidable colB = hostCollidablesB[collidableIndexB];
00313     hullB = hostConvexDataB[colB.m_shapeIndex];
00314     //printf("numvertsB = %d\n",hullB.m_numVertices);
00315     
00316         
00317         b3Float4 contactsOut[B3_MAX_VERTS];
00318         int localContactCapacity = B3_MAX_VERTS;
00319 
00320 #ifdef _WIN32
00321         b3Assert(_finite(bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexA).m_pos.x));
00322         b3Assert(_finite(bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexB).m_pos.x));
00323 #endif
00324         
00325         
00326         {
00327                 
00328                 b3Float4 worldVertsB1[B3_MAX_VERTS];
00329                 b3Float4 worldVertsB2[B3_MAX_VERTS];
00330                 int capacityWorldVerts = B3_MAX_VERTS;
00331 
00332                 b3Float4 hostNormal = b3MakeFloat4(sepNormalWorldSpace.x,sepNormalWorldSpace.y,sepNormalWorldSpace.z,0.f);
00333                 int shapeA = hostCollidablesA[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
00334                 int shapeB = hostCollidablesB[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
00335 
00336                 b3Scalar minDist = -1;
00337                 b3Scalar maxDist = 0.;
00338 
00339                         
00340 
00341                 b3Transform trA,trB;
00342                 {
00343                 //B3_PROFILE("b3TransformPoint computation");
00344                 //trA.setIdentity();
00345                 trA.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(posA.x,posA.y,posA.z));
00346                 trA.setRotation(b3Quaternion(ornA.x,ornA.y,ornA.z,ornA.w));
00347                                 
00348                 //trB.setIdentity();
00349                 trB.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(posB.x,posB.y,posB.z));
00350                 trB.setRotation(b3Quaternion(ornB.x,ornB.y,ornB.z,ornB.w));
00351                 }
00352 
00353                 b3Quaternion trAorn = trA.getRotation();
00354         b3Quaternion trBorn = trB.getRotation();
00355         
00356                 int numContactsOut = b3ClipHullAgainstHull(hostNormal, 
00357                                                 hostConvexDataA.at(shapeA), 
00358                                                 hostConvexDataB.at(shapeB),
00359                                                                 (b3Float4&)trA.getOrigin(), (b3Quaternion&)trAorn,
00360                                                                 (b3Float4&)trB.getOrigin(), (b3Quaternion&)trBorn,
00361                                                                 worldVertsB1,worldVertsB2,capacityWorldVerts,
00362                                                                 minDist, maxDist,
00363                                                                 verticesA,      facesA,indicesA,
00364                                                                 verticesB,      facesB,indicesB,
00365                                                                 
00366                                                                 contactsOut,localContactCapacity);
00367 
00368                 if (numContactsOut>0)
00369                 {
00370                         B3_PROFILE("overlap");
00371 
00372                         b3Float4 normalOnSurfaceB = (b3Float4&)hostNormal;
00373 //                      b3Float4 centerOut;
00374                         
00375                         b3Int4 contactIdx;
00376                         contactIdx.x = 0;
00377                         contactIdx.y = 1;
00378                         contactIdx.z = 2;
00379                         contactIdx.w = 3;
00380                         
00381                         int numPoints = 0;
00382                                         
00383                         {
00384                                 B3_PROFILE("extractManifold");
00385                                 numPoints = b3ReduceContacts(contactsOut, numContactsOut, normalOnSurfaceB,  &contactIdx);
00386                         }
00387                                         
00388                         b3Assert(numPoints);
00389                                         
00390                         if (nContacts<maxContactCapacity)
00391                         {
00392                                 contactIndex = nContacts;
00393                                 globalContactOut->expand();
00394                                 b3Contact4Data& contact = globalContactOut->at(nContacts);
00395                                 contact.m_batchIdx = 0;//i;
00396                                 contact.m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = (bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexA).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexA:bodyIndexA;
00397                                 contact.m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = (bodyBuf->at(bodyIndexB).m_invMass==0)? -bodyIndexB:bodyIndexB;
00398 
00399                                 contact.m_frictionCoeffCmp = 45874;
00400                                 contact.m_restituitionCoeffCmp = 0;
00401                                         
00402                         //      float distance = 0.f;
00403                                 for (int p=0;p<numPoints;p++)
00404                                 {
00405                                         contact.m_worldPosB[p] = contactsOut[contactIdx.s[p]];//check if it is actually on B
00406                                         contact.m_worldNormalOnB = normalOnSurfaceB; 
00407                                 }
00408                                 //printf("bodyIndexA %d,bodyIndexB %d,normal=%f,%f,%f numPoints %d\n",bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,normalOnSurfaceB.x,normalOnSurfaceB.y,normalOnSurfaceB.z,numPoints);
00409                                 contact.m_worldNormalOnB.w = (b3Scalar)numPoints;
00410                                 nContacts++;
00411                         } else
00412                         {
00413                                 b3Error("Error: exceeding contact capacity (%d/%d)\n", nContacts,maxContactCapacity);
00414                         }
00415                 }
00416         }
00417         return contactIndex;
00418 }

00423 
00424 inline int b3ContactConvexConvexSAT(
00425                                                                                                                                 int pairIndex,
00426                                                                                                                                 int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, 
00427                                                                                                                                 int collidableIndexA, int collidableIndexB, 
00428                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>& rigidBodies, 
00429                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Collidable>& collidables,
00430                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexPolyhedronData>& convexShapes,
00431                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& convexVertices,
00432                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Float4>& uniqueEdges,
00433                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& convexIndices,
00434                                                                                                                                 const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& faces,
00435                                                                                                                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4Data>& globalContactsOut,
00436                                                                                                                                 int& nGlobalContactsOut,
00437                                                                                                                                 int maxContactCapacity)
00438 {
00439         int contactIndex = -1;
00440 
00441 
00442         b3Float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
00443         b3Quaternion ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
00444         b3Float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
00445         b3Quaternion ornB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
00446         
00447 
00448         b3ConvexPolyhedronData hullA, hullB;
00449     
00450         b3Float4 sepNormalWorldSpace;
00451 
00452         
00453 
00454     b3Collidable colA = collidables[collidableIndexA];
00455     hullA = convexShapes[colA.m_shapeIndex];
00456     //printf("numvertsA = %d\n",hullA.m_numVertices);
00457     
00458     
00459     b3Collidable colB = collidables[collidableIndexB];
00460     hullB = convexShapes[colB.m_shapeIndex];
00461     //printf("numvertsB = %d\n",hullB.m_numVertices);
00462     
00463         
00464 
00465 
00466 #ifdef _WIN32
00467         b3Assert(_finite(rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos.x));
00468         b3Assert(_finite(rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos.x));
00469 #endif
00470         
00471                 bool foundSepAxis = b3FindSeparatingAxis(hullA,hullB,
00472                                                         posA,
00473                                                         ornA,
00474                                                         posB,
00475                                                         ornB,
00476 
00477                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
00478                                                         convexVertices,uniqueEdges,faces,convexIndices,
00479                                                         
00480                                                         sepNormalWorldSpace
00481                                                         );
00482 
00483         
00484         if (foundSepAxis)
00485         {
00486                 
00487                 
00488                 contactIndex = b3ClipHullHullSingle(
00489                         bodyIndexA, bodyIndexB,
00490                                                    posA,ornA,
00491                                                    posB,ornB,
00492                         collidableIndexA, collidableIndexB,
00493                         &rigidBodies, 
00494                         &globalContactsOut,
00495                         nGlobalContactsOut,
00496                         
00497                         convexShapes,
00498                         convexShapes,
00499         
00500                         convexVertices, 
00501                         uniqueEdges, 
00502                         faces,
00503                         convexIndices,
00504         
00505                         convexVertices,
00506                         uniqueEdges,
00507                         faces,
00508                         convexIndices,
00509 
00510                         collidables,
00511                         collidables,
00512                         sepNormalWorldSpace,
00513                         maxContactCapacity);
00514                         
00515         }
00516 
00517         return contactIndex;
00518 }
